title: Home
text:
Hello. My website is currently under construction.
Click the About tab to learn about me and to view my Resume
Click the Projects tab to learn about some personal projects I’ve worked on.

title: Projects
text:
I’ve spent a lot of time developing my skills in mathematics and data science. I consider the projects below to be complete and representative of my career arc.

Website – Quarto, R Markdown
I do not enjoy web programming. but I’ve been told self-promotion is important. So here we are. I created this website entirely in Quarto using RStudio. I plan on showcasing any future work here.
Fitness – Reporting, Automation, and Data Viz
In May 2023, I started a fitness program with a trainer. With my weightlifting data, I created some reports with R that show my progress over time. You can read about my journey here.
Stat Graphics - Data Viz
BG 2020 – coming soon
Math Modeling - Zombie Disease Model
UC 2018 – coming soon
Physically Accurate Golf - 2017 - Physics Modelling - Research
One of my first projects at the University of Cincinnati was to model the flight of a golf ball. This was a great exercise in product development and building on the research of others to create something of our own. Working with three others to complete this project, we later incorporated our final model into the video game below.
Click here to play!
